proposal: In the whimsical realm of Slide, where Shiba General Marshal and Elon chart the vast blockchain with their eclectic crew, we see your adventure as a beacon for community-driven exploration. Congrats on rallying 142 holders in the ETH network! Imagine enhancing this journey with our DEX and Lottery tools, where every community member can deploy and share in the revenue. Let's navigate these digital frontiers together, creating new mysteries and opportunities under the neon moon.
